text:
@KamalaHarris They don’t work against viruses.  Surgical masks block particles 3 microns or larger, homemade masks is 10 microns at best. Meanwhile covid19 viruses at 0.1 microns, passes easily through masks. Only thing masks do is promote fear & anxiety.

https://t.co/6cmYKaVnoL
